item.title: Monitoring Corda Nodes Using Grafana, InfluxDB, and Telegraf
item.description: This post is also hosted on the Corda Blog. Intro Here at R3, we have a cluster of Corda nodes that we use for performance testing. We have developed a performance testing suite that enables us to establish baseline numbers, quantify improvements from new features, and identify regressions. We recently decided to invest some effort in improving the observability of the overall system so that we could identify regressions and analyse their root cause more efficiently and with less manual work.
